<script>// Pandoc 2.9 adds attributes on both header and div. We remove the former (to
// be compatible with the behavior of Pandoc < 2.8).
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function(e) {
  var hs = document.querySelectorAll("div.section[class*='level'] > :first-child");
  var i, h, a;
  for (i = 0; i < hs.length; i++) {
    h = hs[i];
    if (!/^h[1-6]$/i.test(h.tagName)) continue;  // it should be a header h1-h6
    a = h.attributes;
    while (a.length > 0) h.removeAttribute(a[0].name);
  }
});
</script>

        $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover();
    }
});
</script>

<script>
// apply pandoc div.sourceCode style to pre.sourceCode instead
(function() {
  var sheets = document.styleSheets;
  for (var i = 0; i < sheets.length; i++) {
    if (sheets[i].ownerNode.dataset["origin"] !== "pandoc") continue;
    try { var rules = sheets[i].cssRules; } catch (e) { continue; }
    for (var j = 0; j < rules.length; j++) {
      var rule = rules[j];
      // check if there is a div.sourceCode rule
      if (rule.type !== rule.STYLE_RULE || rule.selectorText !== "div.sourceCode") continue;
      var style = rule.style.cssText;
      // check if color or background-color is set
      if (rule.style.color === '' && rule.style.backgroundColor === '') continue;
      // replace div.sourceCode by a pre.sourceCode rule
      sheets[i].deleteRule(j);
      sheets[i].insertRule('pre.sourceCode{' + style + '}', j);
    }
  }
})();
</script>

<body>




<section class="page-header">
<h1 class="title toc-ignore project-name">消失的客户</h1>
<h3 class="subtitle project-tagline">———某移动通讯客户流失因素分析及建模</h3>
<h4 class="author project-author">常佳奇-1910005</h4>
<h4 class="date project-date">2022-02-27</h4>
</section>



<section class="main-content">
<div id="背景介绍" class="section level2">
<h2><span class="math inline">\({背景介绍}\)</span></h2>
<p><span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>通信技术作为信息技术的组成部分，使人们逐渐走入了数字化时代。随着新技术的投入应用，通讯业也在不断进步和发展，使得人们传递信息的速度更快，能更方便的分享资源，极大便利了人们的生活。为了进一步提高服务质量，并扩大市场份额，通讯公司之间的竞争不断加剧。 </p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>通讯业刚兴起时，运营商不断推出新的服务模式和业务来吸引新客户，主要依靠客户数量不断增长来获取利润。然而随着近些年通讯行业逐渐成熟，通讯人口数已经逐渐趋于饱和状态。对公司而言，此时再继续拓展新客户，带来的利润较小。通讯企业要想长久发展，必须另辟蹊径。 </p>
<p><span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>
根据美国贝恩公司的调查，在商业社会中5％的客户留存率增长意味着公司利润30％的增长，同时把产品卖给老客户的概率是卖给新客户的3倍。报告还指出，吸引新客户的成本是留住现有客户的6-7倍!从调查结果可以看出，提高老客户服务质量防止现有客户流失，对企业的长足发展有着至关重要的作用。然而从三大运营商的2020年度报表来看，在这一年里，中国移动、中国联通用户流失数分别为835.9万户，1266.4万户，唯有中国电信用户数保持了正增长。在用户流失问题十分严重情况下，为了能提前预防客户流失，针对性提出服务改进，建立一套系统的客户流失预警体系已是燃眉之急。<br />
</p>
</div>
<div id="数据总览" class="section level2">

<div id="探索性数据分析" class="section level2">
<h2>探索性数据分析</h2>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb1"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb1-1"><a href="#cb1-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#读入数据,并加载需要准备的包</span></span>
<span id="cb1-2"><a href="#cb1-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> data <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">read.csv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;data/sampledata.csv&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb1-3"><a href="#cb1-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="fu">attach</span>(data)</span>
<span id="cb1-4"><a href="#cb1-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="fu">library</span>(ggplot2)</span>
<span id="cb1-5"><a href="#cb1-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#library(plotly)</span></span></code></pre></div>
<div id="bullet-探究直观变量在网时长当月花费花费的变化与客户流失的关系" class="section level3">
<h3><span class="math inline">\(\bullet\)</span>
探究直观变量（在网时长、当月花费、花费的变化）与客户流失的关系</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb2"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb2-1"><a href="#cb2-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#col_names用来记录数据的列中文名，为后续用for循环绘图做准备</span></span>
<span id="cb2-2"><a href="#cb2-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#y_min、y_max分别记录绘图时纵坐标的最小值和最大值（设定绘图后y轴的显示范围）</span></span>
<span id="cb2-3"><a href="#cb2-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> col_names <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;编号&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;在网时长&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;当月花费&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;个体的度&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;联系强度&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;个体信息熵&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;花费的变化&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;个体度的变化&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb2-4"><a href="#cb2-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> y_min <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">0</span>,<span class="dv">0</span>,<span class="dv">0</span>,<span class="dv">0</span>,<span class="dv">1</span>,<span class="sc">-</span><span class="fl">0.3</span>,<span class="sc">-</span><span class="dv">1</span>)</span>
<span id="cb2-5"><a href="#cb2-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> y_max <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">3000</span>,<span class="dv">400</span>,<span class="dv">150</span>,<span class="dv">20</span>,<span class="dv">5</span>,<span class="fl">0.25</span>,<span class="dv">1</span>)</span>
<span id="cb2-6"><a href="#cb2-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> </span>
<span id="cb2-7"><a href="#cb2-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#循环绘制箱线图（对于直观变量）</span></span>
<span id="cb2-8"><a href="#cb2-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> <span class="cf">for</span>(i <span class="cf">in</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">2</span>,<span class="dv">3</span>,<span class="dv">7</span>)){</span>
<span id="cb2-9"><a href="#cb2-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> p <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">ggplot</span>(data)<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb2-10"><a href="#cb2-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">geom_boxplot</span>( <span class="fu">aes</span>( <span class="at">x =</span> <span class="fu">factor</span>(churn), <span class="at">y =</span> data[,i]) ,<span class="at">fill =</span> <span class="st">&quot;#44c1f0&quot;</span>)<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb2-11"><a href="#cb2-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">labs</span>(<span class="at">x =</span> <span class="st">&quot;是否流失&quot;</span>,<span class="at">y =</span> col_names[i])<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb2-12"><a href="#cb2-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">scale_x_discrete</span>(<span class="at">labels=</span><span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;未流失&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;流失&quot;</span>))<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb2-13"><a href="#cb2-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">scale_y_continuous</span>( <span class="at">limits =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(y_min[i<span class="dv">-1</span>] , y_max[i<span class="dv">-1</span>] ))</span>
<span id="cb2-14"><a href="#cb2-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> </span>
<span id="cb2-15"><a href="#cb2-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> <span class="fu">print</span>(p)</span>
<span id="cb2-16"><a href="#cb2-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> }</span>
<span id="cb2-17"><a href="#cb2-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> </span>
<span id="cb2-18"><a href="#cb2-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#考虑到花费的变化在正值和负值上有本质上的不同，将花费的变化这一数据重构进行绘制堆叠直方图，查看关系</span></span>
<span id="cb2-19"><a href="#cb2-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> condition <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> data<span class="sc">$</span>chgexpense<span class="sc">&gt;</span><span class="dv">0</span></span>
<span id="cb2-20"><a href="#cb2-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="fu">ggplot</span>(data, <span class="fu">aes</span>(<span class="at">x=</span><span class="fu">factor</span>(churn), <span class="at">fill=</span>condition)) <span class="sc">+</span> </span>
<span id="cb2-21"><a href="#cb2-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>     <span class="fu">geom_bar</span>(<span class="at">position=</span><span class="st">&quot;fill&quot;</span>, <span class="at">stat=</span><span class="st">&quot;count&quot;</span>)<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb2-22"><a href="#cb2-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">labs</span>(<span class="at">x =</span><span class="st">&quot;是否流失&quot;</span>,<span class="at">y=</span><span class="st">&quot;&quot;</span>,<span class="at">fill=</span><span class="st">&quot;花费的变化&quot;</span>)<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb2-23"><a href="#cb2-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">scale_x_discrete</span>(<span class="at">labels =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;未流失&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;流失&quot;</span>))<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb2-24"><a href="#cb2-24" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">scale_fill_discrete</span>(<span class="at">labels =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;负值&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;正值&quot;</span>))</span></code></pre></div>
<div class="figure" style="text-align: center">
<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" /><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" /><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" /><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" />
<p class="caption">
</p>
</div>
<p><span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>
对上图，从总体来看，对于在网时长（左上图）这一指标，流失用户和非流失用户无明显差异，但流失用户的在网时长较为集中。对于当月花费（右上图）这一指标，流失用户明显较低且数据集中。而从花费的变化这一指标来看，流失客户也低于非流失用户的值，说明要流失的用户已经开始减少花费增量甚至出现削减花费的趋势。<br />
<span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>
进一步考虑到花费的变化这一指标中正负值的意义差距明显，于是对将花费的变化分为了两类（正值和负值）进行绘图（左下图）。从图可以看出，相比于非流失用户，流失用户花费的变化为负值的比例更大，这也进一步提醒营业者，当用户花费比过去少时，就应考虑用户是否会流失问题。<br />
</p>
</div>
<div id="bullet-探究衍生变量个体的度联系强度个体信息熵个体度的变化与客户流失之间的关系" class="section level3">
<h3><span class="math inline">\(\bullet\)</span>
探究衍生变量（个体的度、联系强度、个体信息熵、个体度的变化）与客户流失之间的关系</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb3"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb3-1"><a href="#cb3-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#col_names用来记录数据的列中文名，为后续用for循环绘图做准备</span></span>
<span id="cb3-2"><a href="#cb3-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#y_min、y_max分别记录绘图时纵坐标的最小值和最大值（设定绘图后y轴的显示范围）</span></span>
<span id="cb3-3"><a href="#cb3-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> </span>
<span id="cb3-4"><a href="#cb3-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> <span class="cf">for</span>(i <span class="cf">in</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">4</span>,<span class="dv">5</span>,<span class="dv">6</span>,<span class="dv">8</span>)){</span>
<span id="cb3-5"><a href="#cb3-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> p <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">ggplot</span>(data)<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb3-6"><a href="#cb3-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">geom_boxplot</span>( <span class="fu">aes</span>( <span class="at">x =</span> <span class="fu">factor</span>(churn), <span class="at">y =</span> data[,i]) ,<span class="at">fill =</span> <span class="st">&quot;#44c1f0&quot;</span>)<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb3-7"><a href="#cb3-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">labs</span>(<span class="at">x =</span> <span class="st">&quot;是否流失&quot;</span>,<span class="at">y =</span> col_names[i])<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb3-8"><a href="#cb3-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">scale_x_discrete</span>(<span class="at">labels=</span><span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="st">&quot;未流失&quot;</span>,<span class="st">&quot;流失&quot;</span>))<span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb3-9"><a href="#cb3-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span>   <span class="fu">scale_y_continuous</span>( <span class="at">limits =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(y_min[i<span class="dv">-1</span>] , y_max[i<span class="dv">-1</span>] ))</span>
<span id="cb3-10"><a href="#cb3-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> </span>
<span id="cb3-11"><a href="#cb3-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> <span class="fu">print</span>(p)</span>
<span id="cb3-12"><a href="#cb3-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">+</span> }</span></code></pre></div>
<div class="figure" style="text-align: center">
<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" /><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" /><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" /><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " width="50%" />
<p class="caption">
</p>
</div>
<p><span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>
从上述四幅图可以看出，对于4个衍生变量而言。流失用户的值都明显低于非流失用户的值。假设一个用户要从通讯公司流失，那么通讯公司所能观察到此用户的个体的度，联系强度，以及信息熵（分别对应左上、右上、左下图）会相应有所减少；同时由于个体度的减少，会使得个体度的变化呈现较多负值，进而使得流失用户在这一指标上会低于非流失用户（右下图）。图像的结果符合现实逻辑，也能大致看出这些衍生变量在区分流失用户与非流失用户方面效果显著。<br />
<span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>
而且值得一提的是，在区分用户是否流失时，直观变量（三个）区分度略低于衍生变量（四个）。从某一方面说明有时合理定义变量在进行建模可能效果会更好一些。</p>
</div>
<div id="bullet-检查数据是否存在多重共线性问题" class="section level3">
<h3><span class="math inline">\(\bullet\)</span>
检查数据是否存在多重共线性问题</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb4"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb4-1"><a href="#cb4-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="co">#检验是否有多重共线性---特征根判别法(选取为数字类型的自变量)</span></span>
<span id="cb4-2"><a href="#cb4-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="er">&gt;</span> XX <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">cor</span>(data[,<span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">2</span><span class="sc">:</span><span class="dv">8</span>)])</span>
<span id="cb4-3"><a href="#cb4-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="sc">&gt;</span> <span class="fu">kappa</span>( XX, <span class="at">exact =</span> T)</span></code></pre></div>
<pre><code>[1] 14.80545</code></pre>
<p><span class="math inline">\(\qquad\)</span>
采用特征根判别法，得到的条件数为14.8，&lt;100，故不认为数据存在严重的多重共线性，也就是可以认为自变量之间是线性无关的。</p>
</div>
</div>
</section>
